name: kestra
tagline: An event driven orchestration platform for workflows and pipelines
description: Kestra is an event driven orchestration and workflow platform. It lets teams define data pipelines and tasks as code, schedule and monitor them, and run at scale on self hosted or managed infrastructure with a comprehensive web UI.

features.title: Workflow Orchestration
features.description: Event-driven pipelines with task scheduling and dependencies. Automate complex data workflows

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Design workflows with drag-and-drop interface or YAML code. Build pipelines visually or programmatically

features.title: REST API
features.description: ETL operations with database, API, and file system connectors. Build scalable data processing

features.title: Task Library
features.description: Pre-built tasks for common operations and integrations. Accelerate workflow development

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Automatic retries, failure notifications, and recovery strategies. Build resilient workflows
